name: CircuitHub
headline: Electronics factory automation
description: CircuitHub is on a mission to fix rapid electronics prototyping. We are the first automated electronics factory built around a modern tech stack. We help hardware companies producing self-driving cars, satellites, 3D printers, robotics, & more to rapidly prototype electronics and get to market faster.

## Get your PCB prototypes from design to delivery in weeks days with CircuitHub's automated, on-demand manufacturing.
![traditional manufacturer vs CircuiHub](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/6683a9807d6e1f1f783a1674_ch-cover.webp)
## Low cost prototype and batch production.
![icon with dollar sign](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666abb89d1e583caef5b1638_icon-more-money.svg)
Traditional manufacturers have to charge high prices for prototypes and low volume batch production due to lack of automation.
![icon with dollar sign](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666abb89b0504357e59e8e71_icon-less-money.svg)
CircuitHub achieves economical on-demand production at low volumes through a technical breakthrough that flattens the price curve.
[See price examples](https://circuithub.com/</pricing>)
## 
3 day full turnkey fab and assembly by default. Made in the USA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666ac0fa80d6eafb6010c8d8_usa-flag.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666abb885725df2b323c9639_icon-more-time.svg)
Traditional manufacturers have to charge high prices for speed due to lack of automation.
![icon time down](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666abb88704472d759ebf825_icon-less-time.svg)
CircuitHub ships 81% of full turnkey orders within 3 days as standard, enabling rapid prototyping and on-demand small batch production.
[See lead time examples](https://circuithub.com/</pricing>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/667da6b7f3dbb8ca69c2955e_ch-calendar-cover.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666ac49a28aa1dd6fe58b2cb_ch-infographic-live-top.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/667a654ba0f41fdedc7df5a1_conveyer.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/667a654ba0f41fdedc7df5a1_conveyer.svg)
![showing the precentage of performance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666ac49ab2ea0108f69ff266_ch-infographic-live-bottom.svg)
## Reliable delivery times and consistently high quality.
The quality of service provided by a contract manufacturer is critical. But without any public data you are left guessing as to the quality of service you'll receive from them. 
![icon star](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666abb886d80dc79d82b40a4_icon-quality-unknown.svg)
Traditional manufacturers leave you guessing as to the quality of service you'll receive from them.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666abb8856ab130981796468_icon-quality-high.svg)
CircuitHub is the first in the industry to publish key performance indicators in real-time.
[See Realtime Metrics](https://circuithub.com/</metrics>)
This radical transparency is the right thing to do for our customers. By taking this step our goal is to lead the way for the entire industry.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666ae81de0496273a2685b62_andrew-avatar.webp)
Andrew Seddon
CEO at CircuitHub
## 35K+ common parts in shared inventory. 
We also stock your unique parts for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666ae4977fa3c5efe1110812_icon-traditional-not-support.svg)
Traditional manufacturers do not stock common parts or make it easy to manage your key parts in inventory
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666ae497e5aeb98d9372e282_icon-ch-support.svg)
CircuitHub allows you to easily manage an inventory of custom parts or pull from our shared common parts.
![A computer screen with a blue background and a yellow border.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/6673a0a2d9f6bd50155fa2a4_ch-ui-board-list.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666ae4e4dca6c45f4056f6fd_ch-35.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666bc97a223033443b3277da_ch-decor.svg)
## Get to market in half the time
Low price and rapid turnaround enables frequent design iteration and agile small batch manufacturing. Rapidly iterate on prototypes with reduced upfront design time. Gradually scale into production without capital intensive large production runs.

Drag and drop your PCB files into the browser. Compatible with Altium, EAGLE, and KiCAD. You can also upload a BOM .csv/.tsv with your EDA files.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666bcaaaba3da1f7cec243db_browser-ui.svg)![A computer screen with a mouse pointing at a part number.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/6672dcb43f7684a95612b4a7_ch-ui-bom.webp)
Our system extracts part numbers from your EDA files and adds them to your BOM, alerting you to out-of-stock parts and MOQs. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666bcaaaba3da1f7cec243db_browser-ui.svg)![A black button with the word "project" on it.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/6672fa892efe7532a9cf3408_ch-ui-board-top.webp)
![a printed circuit board](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/5fff6e50ee46ba21d993cb37_Board%20viewer.png)
CircuitHub's board viewer previews your board and placements, helping you spot any mistakes before ordering.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666bcaaaba3da1f7cec243db_browser-ui.svg)![A computer screen with a blue and white price breakdown page.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/6672f772f0f4cb539ccf7adf_ch-ui-price.webp)
Select the number of assembled boards and your desired lead time. The real-time quote includes pricing for bare boards, parts, and assembly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/666bcaaaba3da1f7cec243db_browser-ui.svg)![A green line on a screen with the words "assemby begins!" on it.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4f3506e94717077b3bdc54/6673026eef4636319cd1c43c_ch-ui-board-status.webp)
Our order page lets you track your order, view the estimated ship date, and communicate directly with the factory to resolve any issues.

**CircuitHub Overview**

Founded in 2012 as part of the Y Combinator Batch W12, CircuitHub is revolutionizing the world of electronics manufacturing by offering an automated approach to PCB assembly and prototyping. Located in London, UK, the company focuses on streamlining the rapid prototyping process for hardware companies engaged in cutting-edge fields such as autonomous vehicles, satellites, 3D printing, and robotics.

**Mission**

At its core, CircuitHub is on a mission to enhance electronics factory automation. The vision is simple yet powerful: enable hardware developers to get their prototypes and finished products to market faster and more efficiently.

**Key Features**

1. **Automated Manufacturing:** CircuitHub operates the first automated electronics factory built around a modern tech stack, allowing it to offer faster turnaround times‚Äî81% of full turnkey orders ship within three days.

2. **Cost-Effective Solutions:** Unlike traditional manufacturers, CircuitHub leverages automation to significantly lower costs associated with low-volume prototypes and small batch production.

3. **Real-Time Data Transparency:** For the first time in the industry, CircuitHub publishes key performance indicators in real-time, providing clients with transparency they can count on.

4. **Shared Inventory:** The platform enables clients to manage over 35,000 common parts and also provides the option to stock unique components, simplifying the ordering process and reducing lead time.

5. **Efficient Order Management:** The CircuitHub platform allows users to upload PCB files directly, instantly receive quotes, and track order status‚Äîeliminating the frustrating back-and-forth usually associated with PCB manufacturing.

**Team & Growth**

CircuitHub has a dedicated team of 58 employees working to achieve its vision, ensuring a blend of technical expertise and customer service. The company's growth is evidenced by the staggering statistics: over 1.57 million boards delivered and 87.4 million parts placed.

**Why Choose CircuitHub?**

Customer testimonials flood in, attesting to CircuitHub‚Äôs quality, speed, and customer support. Clients rave about how easy it is to get prototypes made, highlighting the platform‚Äôs instant quoting, CAD file handling, and overall efficiency. This has made CircuitHub a favored partner for innovation-driven companies who want to stay ahead of the curve without sacrificing quality or speed.

**Connect with CircuitHub**

For those looking to dive deeper into their capabilities or get started with a project, CircuitHub offers direct contact options and a plethora of resources available on their website: [circuitHub.com](https://circuithub.com).

If you're in hardware development and need rapid prototyping that's reliable and cost-effective, CircuitHub might just be the game-changer you‚Äôve been searching for.
